thread.title: Behold, Amy Schumer’s Fabulous Alexander McQueen Coat
thread.title_full: Behold, Amy Schumer’s Fabulous Alexander McQueen Coat

title: Behold, Amy Schumer’s Fabulous Alexander McQueen Coat

organizations.name: jimmy kimmel joke about weight in hollywood sounds kind of familiar from our partners v magazine  this week's top
remy ma drops nicki minaj diss track
fabulous alexander mcqueen duvet coat share on facebook tweet

text:
Amy Schumer making a classic Sunday morning NYC coffee run. Photo: Amy Schumer/Instagram Amy Schumer’s looking Oscar-ready on Instagram this morning in Alexander McQueen’s haute princess puffer. She jokingly captioned the pic, “What to wear? #oscars.”

The cozy duvet coat, which is trimmed with marabou, made its debut in McQueen’s Fall 2016 London Fashion Week show. It’s the perfect thing to throw on when you’re making your morning coffee run to the local bodega.
However, if you plan on stopping to feed the pigeons, you can always opt for Saint Laurent.
